description: GPR174 is involved in the pathogenesis of IBD by regulating the maturation of dendritic cells.
GPR174 participated in TNF-α (NF-κB) signaling pathway.
GPR174 participated in TNF-α (NF-κB) signaling pathway which involves IL-6.
GPR174 modulates the expression of IL-10 in dendritic cells.
GPR174 is involved in the maturation of dendritic cells affecting MHC-II expression.
GPR174 affects the expression of CD80 in dendritic cells.
GPR174 influences the expression of CD86 in dendritic cells.
GPR174 plays a role in the expression of CD40 in dendritic cells.
DSS was administered to establish the mice colitis model, mimicking IBD.
